Text:
If you like the torrent ,please seed as long as you can so that other are able to get it ,too.

I didn't want to convert the .vob and .mkv files so that the quality is the best possible .

Enjoy and keep his spirit alive ! ! !
It seems I have all but,AITW pt.2. I'll be seeding that part for some time.I'm assuming that helps.Thank you very much for putting this up.I was surprised how mesmerizing this was.Thanks again.
